history.proof: assert (H: div n 2 * 2 + rem n 2 = n). - srun best use: div_rem_spec1. - strivial use: rem_2_is_0_or_1, Nat.add_comm, Nat.mul_comm.

original: assert (H: div n 2 * 2 + rem n 2 = n). { apply div_rem_spec1. } rewrite H. split. - apply rem_prop with (n:=div n 2) (p:=2) (r:=rem n 2). unfold div. apply div_full. - apply rem_2_is_0_or_1.
